comment:
* Digital channel id. *

* It consists of the following fields *

    *
  • channel number format: 6bits *
  • major number: 10bits *
  • minor number: 16bits *
  • reserved: 2bytes *
* @hide

variables.name: mChannelIdentifier
variables.comment: Identifies the logical or virtual channel number of a service.

methods.name: public static DigitalChannelData ofTwoNumbers(int majorNumber, int minorNumber)
public int toByteArray(byte[] data, int index)

methodNames: public static DigitalChannelData ofTwoNumbers(int majorNumber, int minorNumber)
public int toByteArray(byte[] data, int index)
